title: Ensure product name is displayed throughout the UI

requirements.text: Ensure each product’s name is clearly displayed in all existing product presentation areas, including the product list cards and the product details view, using English user-facing text.
acceptanceCriteria: On the product list, every product card displays the product name as visible text (not only as an image alt attribute).
On the product details view, the selected product’s name is displayed prominently as the page title/header.
No user-facing text related to product naming is introduced in a non-English language.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or any other paths listed in frontend.immutablePaths.
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor; only add migration.mo if an existing stable state schema must change.
nonGoals: Adding a new cart page or checkout flow.
Adding product creation/editing forms or admin functionality.
Changing the seeded product catalog content beyond ensuring names are displayed.
